name: Healing Hearts
summary: Healing Hearts follows Nurse Lucy and Surgeon Kevin as they team up to solve a perplexing medical case involving an elderly patient, Ms. Carter. Initially clashing over their differing approaches—holistic care versus surgical precision—they learn to combine their strengths. Through teamwork and compassion, they diagnose and treat the rare condition, saving Ms. Carter’s life. Along the way, their professional admiration deepens into a heartfelt connection, blending healing, personal growth, and budding romance.
